vexMod:ConsolationPrize.NAME: Consolation Prize
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain that much Gold.

vexMod:GhostlyGear.NAME: Ghostly Gear
vexMod:GhostlyGear.FLAVOR: The sword and shield are more difficult to see each time you look.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Ï€Strike or Defend, #yExhaust it.

vexMod:CursedCompass.NAME: Cursed Compass
vexMod:CursedCompass.FLAVOR: No matter which way you turn, it always points forwards...
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Future maps contain only #b1 path.

vexMod:MemoryStick.NAME: Memory Locket
vexMod:MemoryStick.FLAVOR: If you squeeze it hard enough you can remember the open beta.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your first turn, #yRetain your hand.

vexMod:Cooldron.NAME: Naga Cauldron
vexMod:Cooldron.FLAVOR: Secretly the greatest playmaker ever to be concieved by mankind.
DESCRIPTIONS: All Potions you find are Entropic Brews.

vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.NAME: Invisible Cloak
vexMod:InvisibilityCloak.FLAVOR: You're far too modest to "wear" this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose #b1 #yStrength.

vexMod:TanglingVine.NAME: Tangling Vine
vexMod:TanglingVine.FLAVOR: Don't take this the wrong way.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, take #b2 damage.

vexMod:MindDevourer.NAME: Mind Devourer
vexMod:MindDevourer.FLAVOR: Mm, shiny! Wait, what was your name again?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of combat, remove a random card from your deck.

vexMod:FocusSash.NAME: Focus Sash
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die while you have at least #b10 HP, heal to #b1 HP instead.

vexMod:BigBerry.NAME: Big Berry
vexMod:BigBerry.FLAVOR: You had no idea they could get this big.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b30.

vexMod:RetaliationKit.NAME: Retaliation Kit
vexMod:RetaliationKit.FLAVOR: All you need to disappear in a burst of smoke! Smoke no longer included.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time your #yBlock is broken each combat, apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

vexMod:CardConverter.NAME: Box of Bandaids
vexMod:CardConverter.FLAVOR: Vends only when shown cool techniques.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you add a card into your deck, increase your Max HP by #b1.

vexMod:ScavengeHelm.NAME: Writhing Mask
vexMod:ScavengeHelm.FLAVOR: It squirms on your face uncomfortably.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yMalleable.

vexMod:TimeEaterHat.NAME: Snail's Watch
vexMod:TimeEaterHat.FLAVOR: Someone is going to want this back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b12 cards in a single combat, end your turn and gain #b2 #yStrength.

vexMod:Dragonfruit.NAME: Dragon Fruit
vexMod:Dragonfruit.FLAVOR: As a connoisseur would say, piquant.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b5. Whenever you draw a #yStatus or #yCurse card, deal #b6 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:LichBottle.NAME: Lich's Phylactery
vexMod:LichBottle.FLAVOR: It feels cold in your hands, no matter what you do...
DESCRIPTIONS: #pPrevent #pALL #pHP #ploss. For every #b10 damage prevented, remove a random card from your deck. When your deck has no cards, you #rlose.

vexMod:BarristanHead.NAME: Right Greave
DESCRIPTIONS: If you have #b25% or less HP at the start of your turn, gain #b4 #yBlock.

vexMod:HeadHunter.NAME: Skull Hunter
vexMod:HeadHunter.FLAVOR: You're bringing this conflict to a head.
DESCRIPTIONS: Elites drop an additional Rare card reward.

vexMod:EndlessSickness.NAME: Endless Sickness
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, shuffle a #rVirus into your draw pile.
Viruses are #rStatus cards that duplicate themselves when drawn.

vexMod:BerryBomb.NAME: Berry Bomb
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b6. In #b
combats, explodes and deals #b100 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:PlasmaPancake.NAME: Plasma Pancake
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b6. NL At the start of each combat, deal #b11 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:DeviousBotling.NAME: Devious Botling
vexMod:DeviousBotling.FLAVOR: A tiny little mini-bot whose prime directive is to mess with people.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Torments you on every 3rd turn.
I hope you didn't need that
I don't feel like giving you Energy this turn,
Not sharing my Energy this turn,
Hope you didn't need my Energy this turn,
No Energy for you this turn,
Thrash this loser for me, Gremlin.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Torments you every 3rd turn and in other ways.
When you try so hard and you don't succeed...
You tried so hard and got so far NL but in the end, NL it didn't even matter...
Say hi to Neow for me!
Get that weak deck outta here!
Try not to die next time.
Roses are red, violets are blue. NL A loser is dead, that loser is you.
This card reward is better off without
Looks like your deck will go without

vexMod:WellWornAnklet.NAME: Right Greave
vexMod:WellWornAnklet.FLAVOR: Forever waiting to be reunited with Left Greave.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turns #b3 and #b7, gain #b7 #yBlock.

vexMod:ImprovementManual.NAME: Improvement Manual
vexMod:ImprovementManual.FLAVOR: Ahh, so THAT's how you make a card Innate!

vexMod:PaidLearning.NAME: Paid Education
vexMod:PaidLearning.FLAVOR: That was just the down payment.

vexMod:GildedClover.NAME: Gilded Clover
DESCRIPTIONS: ALL future cards you find are #yRare.

vexMod:FluxCapacitor.NAME: Clock Rock
vexMod:FluxCapacitor.FLAVOR: Tick tock goes the clock rock.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You have #b600 seconds to live. Gain #b60 seconds after each combat.

vexMod:MegatonBomb.NAME: Superbombomb
vexMod:MegatonBomb.FLAVOR: A superweapon beyond any technology. Who made this...?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #rlose #b1 HP from #gradiation #gpoisoning. NL #pRight #pclick: #rDestroy #rthis #rrelic #rand #gOBLITERATE #rall #renemies.

vexMod:NewClearReactor.NAME: New, Clear Reactor
vexMod:NewClearReactor.FLAVOR: Totally safe! Good for the environment! Fosters mutations!
DESCRIPTIONS: Energy is conserved between turns and combats. You no longer gain Energy each turn. Set your energy to #b100 upon pickup and at the start of each Act.

vexMod:RockOfEvil.NAME: Horrorstone
vexMod:RockOfEvil.FLAVOR: Holding it fills you with terror. You drop it, but it writhes back into your pocket.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, obtain #b666 #yGold and a #rBlight.

vexMod:StarEater.NAME: Star Eater
vexMod:StarEater.FLAVOR: One by one, the stars in the sky wink out.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the end of your turn, decrease the #yStellar #yPhase by #b2.

vexMod:Spotlight.NAME: Spotlight
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b3 #yStarlit to ALL enemies.

vexMod:Trinoculars.NAME: Trinoculars
vexMod:Trinoculars.FLAVOR: Lets you see three times as many stars!

vexMod:FakeStar.NAME: Fake Star
vexMod:FakeStar.FLAVOR: But if you squint it looks pretty real!
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yStellar card you play each combat will be active.

vexMod:GravityRainbow.NAME: Gravitational Rainbow
vexMod:GravityRainbow.FLAVOR: "But rainbows aren't affected by gravity!" you say. Well, pah!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of every odd-numbered turn, put the bottom card of your draw pile into your hand.

vexMod:MusicMaker.NAME: Pipes of Chaos
vexMod:MusicMaker.FLAVOR: Crafted by an evil god, you shudder to play it.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Draw #b2 less cards each turn. Whenever you play a card, #ybard:Queue a [WildNote] [REMOVE_SPACE].

vexMod:BottledTune.NAME: Bottled Tune
vexMod:BottledTune.FLAVOR: You crack the lid and hear a faint sound.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a #ybard:Note. At the start of each combat, #ybard:Queue that #ybard:Note.
At the start of each combat, #ybard:Queue a

vexMod:SingingFlower.NAME: Singing Flower
vexMod:SingingFlower.FLAVOR: It's, like, in tune with the planet's energy, dude!

vexMod:AutoTuner.NAME: Auto Tuner
vexMod:AutoTuner.FLAVOR: Sure, it sounds strange, but it's technically tuned!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, perform a random #ybard:Melody.

vexMod:Warpstrument.NAME: Warped Instrument
vexMod:Warpstrument.FLAVOR: This twisted bunch of tubes never quite sounds the same.

vexMod:AudienceDoll.NAME: Audience Doll
vexMod:AudienceDoll.FLAVOR: Always there to listen and offer support!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you perform a #ybard:Melody, draw #b1 card.

vexMod:DeadRequiem.NAME: Dead Requiem
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you perform a #ybard:Melody, #ybard:Queue a random #ybard:Note.

vexMod:SolarSystemDiorama.NAME: Galaxy Diorama
DESCRIPTIONS: The additional effects of your #ySolar and #yLunar cards are always active.

vexMod:CleansingRadio.NAME: Anger Radio
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you #ybard:Queue #b3 of the same #ybard:Note in a single turn, deal #b5 damage to ALL enemies.

vexMod:ThrowingStar.NAME: Throwing Star
vexMod:ThrowingStar.FLAVOR: Unorthodox use for the stars, but it's OK.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play or Exhaust #b3 #yStars in a single turn, gain #b1 #yStrength.

vexMod:RainbowShades.NAME: Rainbow Shades
vexMod:RainbowShades.FLAVOR: Lookin' to the sky in style.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you draw an #yEthereal card each combat, put a copy of it on top of your draw pile.

vexMod:PreRecordedMusic.NAME: Mediocre Mixtape
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, perform a random #ybard:Melody.

vexMod:ElectroStars.NAME: Cyborg Telescope
vexMod:ElectroStars.FLAVOR: You realize now that every electric volt is a tiny star too.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with #b3 Orb slots. Whenever you play a #yStar, #yChannel #b1 #yLightning.

vexMod:FutureSight.NAME: Sight of Future Skies
vexMod:FutureSight.FLAVOR: You see it all laid out. One day the sky shall burn away.
DESCRIPTIONS: .[] NL Whenever you play a card, put it on the bottom of your draw pile.

vexMod:MiniStar.NAME: Pet Star
vexMod:MiniStar.FLAVOR: Feed with hydrogen and helium daily.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, increment the #yStellar #yPhase.

vexMod:Spyglass.NAME: Sextant
DESCRIPTIONS: You can see the contents of #y? rooms.

vexMod:MysteryBossChallenge.NAME: Mystery Boss Challenge
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose Energy or Non-Energy and obtain a random boss relic of that type.
Choose what kind of boss relic you want.
